name: Leave the Lift
description:
During a normal day at work while you're heading to your office, you take the elevator like every day. But this time, something goes awry...

What will you do to leave the lift?

This is a VR simulation with the objective of putting you in a tight spot. Being trapped in the elevator should get you thinking of all the ways to get out...keep in mind not all of them are equal though! 

(LTL was made in 6 weeks, as a proyect for summer classes.) Instructions/Controls

Leave the Lift presents you with branching options, some with consequences that can pile up during your experience. Getting rescued in the best condition possible is all up to you.

ActionVR controlsteleportRight hand, back buttonselectRight hand, scroll button Royalty Free Music Local Forecast-Elevator by Kevin Macleod Bughici - Suite for Violin 7 Lyric Song, lento by Advent Chamber http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Advent_Chamber_Orchestra/Selections_from_the_N...
